events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer role and will review their resume shortly to determine initial fit.
The candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on their experience with software development and relevant skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process and coordinate next steps.
The initial phone screening was completed successfully, where the candidate demonstrated strong fundamental knowledge relevant to the engineer position.
The candidate promptly responded to our scheduling email and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-03-10 with the engineering team to assess the candidate's problem-solving and coding skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding ability and system design understanding that exceeded expectations.
An HR interview has been arranged for 2024-03-15 to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and candidate expectations in more detail.
The HR interview was successful, with the candidate showing strong alignment with company values and expressing high motivation.
An official job offer was proposed to the candidate outlining salary, benefits, and role responsibilities for the engineering position.
The candidate provided feedback expressing enthusiasm about the offer and requested clarification on some benefits and work from home policies.
The candidate has accepted the job offer and is excited to join the engineering team starting next month.
The onboarding process has started for the new engineer, including IT setup, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hiring process is officially closed as the candidate has fully onboarded and started contributing to the engineering projects.
